channel.title: Advice pl0x?
channel.description:
Hey guys I feel kind've stupid for asking this :o, but I kinda hit a brick wall on my creative side, I'm getting paid to redesign my employers web site and I am trying to think of ways to make it look more professional and that isn't really my area. So I was wondering on some pointers, the site is www.donnlordphoto.com. I stripped out all of the crappy looking links on the top and made up some buttons for them, I also fixed the titles and shit. Any input and code would be much appreciated.
James

item.title: Advice pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

3.65 kilos:

Maybe a border around the whole area with text? And definitely a better background. Something not so bland…

I ended up going with some warm colors and buttons to keep it easy on the eyes and keep it clean and professional, I think I’ll take your idea and put a border around the text too. Thanks <3++.

Read full topic
